info.name: Oracle Cloud Common Services
info.description:
# Oracle Cloud Common Web Services Postman Specs for OEC Applications REST & SOAP services.
Authentication is set at the collection parent as Basic Auth. ## Documentation Links The following links are the currently active Oracle SOAP/REST API documentation. ## SCM Cloud REST APIs https://apicatalog.oraclecloud.com/ui/views/categoryDrillDown/%2Fapplications%2Fsupply-chain-management ## SOAP Financials Cloud https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/saas/financials/r13-update17d/oeswf/index.html ## SOAP HCM Cloud https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/saas/global-human-resources/r13-update17d/oeswh/toc.htm

request.description: NOTE: Refer to the Oracle Authentication (JWT) Service documentation as this is a prerequisite for that service.

Authenticates a user using the Oracle login portal and retrieves a JWT token to authenticate services. Lasts for 4 hours.

NOTE: Requires the following:
 - Run the Oracle Anti Xsrf Service and get the xsrftoken value.
 - Create a cookie called XSRF-TOKEN with the xsrf token value.
 - Create a header called x-xsrf-token with the xsrf token value.

Documentation:
https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/saas/engagement/19b/faoka/OKEC_Use_JWT_Token_for_Authorization.html
